title: Keep Your Pets Warm
desc: Use sweaters or blankets to keep your pets cozy during cold nights.

title: Provide Fresh Water
desc: Ensure their water bowl doesn’t freeze during chilly mornings.

title: Moisturize Their Paws
desc: Use pet-safe balm to protect their paws from dryness or cracking.

title: Limit Outdoor Time
desc: Too much cold exposure can be harmful; take shorter walks.
